name: sam-gov-connector
description: SAM.gov federal contractor registration and entity search integration
author: Hermetic Labs

card.title: SAM.gov Connector
card.description: Federal contractor registration and entity search integration

summary.overview: SAM.gov integration for federal contractor workflows - entity search, registration status, exclusion records, contract opportunities, and CAGE code lookups.
summary.exampleUseCase: Verify a vendor's SAM registration status before awarding a contract, check exclusion records for compliance, and monitor contract opportunities matching your NAICS codes.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Direct SAM.gov API access without third-party intermediaries. Integrates with USAspending connector for complete federal procurement workflows.
